title: HRLA COVID-19 UPDATES
cleaned_text: | | Please review documents below regarding updated Notice for Health Regulation and Licensing Administration (HRLA) Licensees (Health Professionals) COVID-19 Continuing Education (CE) Requirement The following licensed professions must complete at least two (2) hours of continuing education on COVID-19 vaccines, including but not limited to COVID-19 vaccine safety, best practices for counseling patients about COVID-19 vaccines, and COVID-19 vaccine efficacy and effectiveness, on or before September 30, 2021: - Advanced Practice Registered Nurse - Audiologist - Chiropractor - Dentist - Dietician - Doctor of Osteopath - Licensed Clinical Social Worker - Licensed Graduate Professional Counselor - Licensed Graduate Social Worker - Independent Clinical Social Worker - Licensed Practical Nurse - Licensed Professional Counselor - Long Term Care Administrator - Marriage and Family Therapist - Medical Doctor - Nutritionist - Occupational Therapist - Optometrist - Pharmacist - Physical Therapist - Physician Assistant - Podiatrist - Psychologist - Registered Nurse - Respiratory Care Therapist; or - Specch Language Pathologist. Licensees should retain proof of your Covid-19 vaccination Continuing Education courses taken to submit at the next renewal. A list of optional courses is provided below: Courses: CDC COVID-19 Vaccine Training Modules CDC (4 modules totaling: 1.75) [https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/ed/covid19/](https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/ed/covid19/) COVID-19 Vaccination: A Guide for Providers Yale (1.0) [https://yale.cloud-cme.com/course/courseoverview?P=0&EID=24141](https://yale.cloud-cme.com/course/courseoverview?P=0&EID=24141) Vaccinating Adolescents: Injectable Vaccines CDC (0.5) [https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/ed/covid19/videos/adolescent/adolescent.asp](https://www2.cdc.gov/vaccines/ed/covid19/videos/adolescent/adolescent.asp) COVID-19 Vaccine: Practical Clinical Considerations American College of Physicians (1.0) [https://www.acponline.org/cme-moc/online-learning-center/covid-19-vaccine-practical-clinical-considerations](https://www.acponline.org/cme-moc/online-learning-center/covid-19-vaccine-practical-clinical-considerations) COVID-19 Vaccine: Promoting Vaccine Acceptance American College of Physicians (1.0) [https://www.acponline.org/cme-moc/online-learning-center/covid-19-vaccine-promoting-vaccine-acceptance](https://www.acponline.org/cme-moc/online-learning-center/covid-19-vaccine-promoting-vaccine-acceptance) COVID-19: Vaccine Education and Debunking Myth Mayo (1.5) [https://ce.mayo.edu/online-education/content/covid-19-vaccine-education-and-debunking-myth-online-cme-course](https://ce.mayo.edu/online-education/content/covid-19-vaccine-education-and-debunking-myth-online-cme-course) COVID-19 Vaccines: Myths, Mysteries, Misinformation, Myopia and Miracles Mayo (1.5) [https://ce.mayo.edu/online-education/content/covid-19-vaccines-myths-mysteries-misinformation-myopia-and-miracles-online-cme-course](https://ce.mayo.edu/online-education/content/covid-19-vaccines-myths-mysteries-misinformation-myopia-and-miracles-online-cme-course) Licensure Waiver: -
